statements: SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, energy_consumption FROM smart_home_devices WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT room_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, energy_consumption FROM smart_home_devices WHERE energy_consumption > 50;
SELECT device_name, room_name, energy_consumption FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light' ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat' ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC
SELECT device_name, room_name, energy_consumption FROM smart_home_devices WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY room_name ASC
SELECT device_name, device_type, energy_consumption FROM smart_home_devices WHERE energy_consumption > 50 ORDER BY device_name ASC, energy_consumption DESC
SELECT device_name, room_name, energy_consumption FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smart Plug' AND is_active = TRUE ORDER BY room_name, energy_consumption ASC
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, room_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE is_active = FALSE AND energy_consumption < 20 ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT * FROM smart_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, power_consumption FROM smart_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smart TV';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM routines WHERE end_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT routine_id, routine_name, start_time, end_time FROM routines ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_devices WHERE power_consumption > 100 ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT device_name, AVG(power_consumption) AS average_consumption FROM smart_devices GROUP BY device_name HAVING AVG(power_consumption) > 50
SELECT * FROM routines WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY routine_name DESC
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices WHERE device_type = 'smart thermostat' AND power_consumption < 50
SELECT routine_name, end_time FROM routines WHERE end_time < '18:00:00'
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_location='Living Room';
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT routine_name, start_time, end_time FROM routines WHERE end_time IS NOT NULL;
SELECT timestamp, device_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 10;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_location='Living Room';
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';

SELECT device_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM smart_home_devices JOIN energy_usage ON smart_home_devices.device_id = energy_usage.device_id GROUP BY device_name ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE is_smart = TRUE;
SELECT room_name, floor_number FROM rooms ORDER BY floor_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_used > 10;
SELECT device_name, timestamp FROM smart_home_devices JOIN energy_consumption ON smart_home_devices.device_id = energy_consumption.device_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE is_smart = TRUE ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, room_name FROM smart_home_devices JOIN rooms ON smart_home_devices.room_id = rooms.room_id ORDER BY room_name, device_name DESC;

SELECT device_id, device_name, energy_used FROM smart_home_devices JOIN energy_consumption ON smart_home_devices.device_id = energy_consumption.device_id WHERE energy_used > 50 ORDER BY energy_used DESC;

SELECT r.routine_name, r.description, COUNT(ec.energy_id) AS energy_count FROM routines r LEFT JOIN energy_consumption ec ON r.routine_id = ec.device_id GROUP BY r.routine_name, r.description ORDER BY energy_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light'
SELECT device_name, power_consumption FROM smart_devices WHERE room_id = 2
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC
SELECT * FROM routines WHERE time_of_day > '12:00:00'
SELECT user_id, username FROM users
SELECT * FROM smart_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, power_consumption FROM smart_devices WHERE power_consumption > 100 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT room_name, temperature, humidity FROM rooms WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT * FROM routines WHERE trigger_device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM smart_devices WHERE device_type = 'Sensor');
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%' ORDER BY email DESC;
